sentence: Our room was also missing a robe and the maintenance guy helped get us another one
I was not very happy to have to redo my luggage to another room but was given a 50 credit in the restaurants and bars as compensation
It did need some minor cleaning scrubbing in some areas but love the decor
Needs a bit of remodeling event though it only 5 years old
I found this hotel to be a very average experience it shows its wear and tear and in some respects can use some upgrading The room suite was very average despite my upgrade
No more cabs for me in VegasChandelier bar the bottom level is being renovated which takes a bit away from the whole chandelier bar but it was still gorgeous
We did have some minor issues with our room but one trip to the front desk within 10 minutes we had a maintenance team at our door to fix the problems
The rooms are still gorgeous but on my last two stays there were issues with maintenance and cleanliness

Allegiant called in to get it updated but the Cosmo advised them since I was in the check in status it could no longer be updated even though I paid for the whole reservation and was using my card to pay for incidentals and resort fees
Due to a number of minor maintenance issues we saw 4 rooms during our stay long story

Had a fantastic stayThe room was lovely Very clean updated looks fantastic viewsHotel is in a fantastic location and I found everything to be within walking distance and it was very easy to get around
We got a newly renovated room on the 63 floor in the Boulevard Tower
Beautiful hotel well maintained and newly renovated
Stayed in the newly renovated rooms and thought they were very nice
Nice hotel and the staff is great but currently doing renovations on the floors above us and very loud during the day
We stayed in a renovated city view room and did most of our gambling and dining at the Cosmopolitan
We booked a Terrace One Bedroom Fountain view and were given a freshly renovated room on the 55th floor of the Chelsea Tower
On the positive side room interiors have been refreshed which was nice to see
The renovated terrace room is spacious clean and well equipped
We stay at the Chelsea Tower which is newly renovated
